title: Bermuda Tourism's Hanbury on Boon of America's Cup 2017 (Audio)
itunes:title: Bermuda Tourism's Hanbury on Boon of America's Cup 2017 (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Bill Hanbury, CEO of the Bermuda Tourism Authority, on the health of the industry and what's driving tourism in Bermuda. Broadcasting live from Elbow Beach Bermuda.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
